00033 class DiagonalConstraint

00035  public:
00037   static void ApplyConstraint(arma::mat& covariance)
00038   {
00039     // Save the diagonal only.
00040     arma::vec diagonal = covariance.diag();
00041     covariance = arma::diagmat(diagonal);
